item.description: This group seems to be the most open to people from various countries and cultural backgrounds. Hopefully, some of you will be interested in this idea.  If you are interested in  intellectually stimulating and culturally intriguing conversations, please come and join the conversation. conversations will be in english or you can do a language exchange.

group.name: The Boston Euro Social Meetup Group

item.name: Cultural Exchange Conversations between native and non-native English speakers
